page.title: 18GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: In our school we play many games on the yard.My favourite game is Rounders and Netball.We play many other games such as Bulldog,Stuck in the mud,Postman's Knock,Tick,Please may I, Who's got the ball,Donkey,Tennis, Football and Cricket.These are the games we play outside.We play many games inside aswell like Snakes and Ladders,Chess,Draughts,Ludo and Dominoes.This is how you play Bulldog. One person stands in the middle of the yard and all the other chilldren run when the person shouts Bulldog.All the chilldren run to the other side of the yard trying not to be ticked .If they are ticked they have to help the person who shouts Bulldog to tick the rest of the chilldren.This goes on until there is only one person left and that person is on.
